verses.text:
Eternal Father, God of love, Creator of the universe,
Pour out thy Spirit from above As from thy temple we disperse.

Keep thou our souls, till all we say
May honor thee, our God and King;
That our example day by day
May teach the sacred truths we sing.

Direct our wayward steps aright,
Our Guide and our deliverer be;
In vain eternal arms of might
Unfold and draw us nearer thee.
